channel.title: [PI] Logging out after selling something to shop
channel.description: Basically the server relogs (reestablishes connection) any character that sells something to a shop each time they sell something. I just need to know where to look and what i should look for.

item.title: [PI] Logging out after selling something to shop
item.dc:creator: @thock321 thock321
item.description:
@thock321 wrote:

i get an error in run.bat with

for (int i = 0; i < Server.shopHandler.ShopItems.length; i++) { [b]if ((Server.shopHandler.ShopItems[c.myShopId][i] - 1) == itemID) {[/b] Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][i] += amount; Added = true; } }
im gonna look into it. please help if you can

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Logging out after selling something to shop

item.title: [PI] Logging out after selling something to shop
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

First look for any errors that might be thrown by the server (NEVER have empty catch blocks).

You should also look at the code that deals with selling items to a shop, and see if there are any logic errors.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Logging out after selling something to shop
